content.rendered:
SEGMENTS

By focusing on specific market segments, our businesses work together to bring efficiencies across the board to our customers.

  • Building Materials
  • Construction
  • Real Estate
  • Automotive
  • Other

SEGMENTS

We’ve diversified into other industries, too, such as automotive dealerships and outdoor advertising.

BUILDING MATERIALS

Our business units that provide sand & gravel, crushed stone, asphalt, concrete block, ready mix concrete, hardscapes, metal roofing and siding systems, and colored mortars.

CONSTRUCTION

General contracting, sitework, industrial services, and welding and fabrication businesses.

REAL ESTATE

Businesses targeting both the retail and commercial sectors.

AUTOMOTIVE

New and used auto dealerships, auto service & repair, collision centers, parts distribution, car washes.

OTHER

Outdoor advertising, airport services.
